body_html: I'm planning to work on adding an option to just pass a value instead of an initializer in tf.get_variable. Maybe this initializer will not be needed then. Currently you can use "lamda x: x" as initializer, but we should have a better way soon.
body_text: I'm planning to work on adding an option to just pass a value instead of an initializer in tf.get_variable. Maybe this initializer will not be needed then. Currently you can use "lamda x: x" as initializer, but we should have a better way soon.
body: I'm planning to work on adding an option to just pass a value instead of an initializer in tf.get_variable. Maybe this initializer will not be needed then. Currently you can use "lamda x: x" as initializer, but we should have a better way soon.
